item.title: 以下是美国 11 月份 CPI 报告的主要内容
item.description: 以下是周三公布的 11 月份美国消费者价格指数报告的主要内容：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from the November US consumer price index report released Wednesday:】

item.title: Match 集团下调收入预期，推出分红计划
item.description: Match Group Inc.周三下调了第四季度的两项营收预期，令一直期待这家约会应用公司出现转机的投资者大失所望。【原文：Match Group Inc. lowered two of its fourth-quarter revenue forecasts on Wednesday, disappointing investors who have been waiting for a turnaround at the dating app company.】

item.title: 华为新款 Mate 70 手机显示其芯片进展停滞不前
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.）的最新旗舰智能手机采用的芯片与一年前在华盛顿敲响警钟的芯片差别不大，这预示着这家中国公司的技术进步正在放缓。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s latest flagship smartphone is powered by a chip little different from the one that set off alarm bells in Washington a year ago, signaling a slowdown in the Chinese company’s tech advances.】

item.title: 交易员押注美联储本月减息，国债上涨
item.description: 在一份报告显示上月消费者物价加速上涨符合预期后，美国国债上涨，交易商也提高了对美联储本月降息的押注。【原文：US Treasuries gained and traders boosted their bets on a Federal Reserve interest-rate reduction this month after a report showed consumer prices last month accelerated in line with expectations.】

item.title: 美国核心通胀保持坚挺，连续第四年增长 0.3
item.description: 美国消费者价格在 11 月份继续上涨，其速度加剧了人们对抑制通胀的进展停滞不前的担忧。【原文：US consumer prices continued to rise in November at a pace that is fueling concerns the progress toward taming inflation is stalling.】

item.title: 据说德国将聘请罗斯柴尔德为德国商业银行提供顾问服务
item.description: 德国已聘请 Rothschild & Co.为其剩余的德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）股份提供咨询，此前德国在 9 月份进行的部分出售因允许意大利竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）插手而受到广泛批评。【原文：Germany has hired Rothschild & Co. to advise on its remaining Commerzbank AG stake, after a partial sale in September was widely criticized for allowing Italian rival UniCredit SpA to swoop in.】

item.title: 智利铜生产商就联合冶炼厂事宜展开会谈
item.description: 据知情人士透露，智利两家国有铜业公司 Codelco 和 Enami 正在讨论将各自的冶炼产能合并为一个项目的可能性。【原文：Codelco and Enami, Chile’s two state copper companies, are discussing the possibility of combining their respective efforts to expand smelting capacity into a single project, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Mobileye 与 Innoviz 合作为自动驾驶系统提供激光雷达
item.description: Mobileye Global Inc.将在其向汽车制造商提供的自动驾驶系统中使用 Innoviz Technologies Ltd.生产的激光传感器，这可能会增加该公司的收入，因为它正寻求通过更广泛地部署自动驾驶汽车来实现盈利。【原文：Mobileye Global Inc. will use laser sensors made by Innoviz Technologies Ltd. for its autonomous driving system it supplies to vehicle manufacturers, a potential revenue boost for the upstart as it seeks to become profitable through wider deployment of self-driving vehicles.】

item.title: 特朗普以豁免权为由赢得 "社会协议真相 "诉讼延期
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得了一项法庭命令，中止其社交媒体平台联合创始人对他提起的诉讼，以便特拉华州法官权衡总统豁免权是否适用于此案。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump won a court order halting a lawsuit against him by the co-founders of his social media platform so a Delaware judge can weigh whether presidential immunity applies to the case.】

item.title: 泰森拳赛之后，杰克-保罗的 W 系列产品扩展到 H-E-B、克罗格超市
item.description: YouTube 明星杰克-保罗（Jake Paul）刚刚在 Netflix 上与前拳王迈克-泰森（Mike Tyson）进行了一场广受关注的拳击比赛，明年年初，他将把自己的 W 美容产品推广到 H-E-B 和 Kroger 连锁杂货店以及亚马逊网站。【原文：Fresh off his widely watched fight on Netflix with former boxing champ Mike Tyson, YouTube star Jake Paul is expanding his W grooming products early next year to the H-E-B and Kroger grocery chains, along with Amazon.com.】

item.title: 布林肯前往中东，美国寻求在叙利亚未来中发挥作用
item.description: 国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）将重返中东，拜登政府正试图在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之前控制叙利亚正在发生的混乱局面。【原文：Secretary of State Antony Blinken is heading back to the Middle East as the Biden administration tries to shape the unfolding chaos in Syria before Donald Trump returns to the White House.】

item.title: 液化天然气在日益加剧的气候压力下寻求未来
item.description:
由于燃料将在未来几十年发挥重要作用，各公司正在研究如何降低其对环境的影响。【原文：

With the fuel set to play an important role in coming decades, firms are working out how to lower its environmental impact.

】

item.title: 桑坦德银行暗示将放弃地区业绩，惹怒分析师
item.description: 花旗集团全球市场（Citigroup Global Markets）和 Autonomous Research 的分析师认为，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）如果放弃按地域报告业绩的做法，就有可能使投资者感到困惑，并影响其股票的表现。【原文：Banco Santander SA risks confusing investors and denting the performance of its shares if it drops the practice of reporting results along geographical lines, according to analysts at Citigroup Global Markets and Autonomous Research.】

item.title: 可口可乐将向 Jubilant 集团出售印度装瓶部门 40% 的股份
item.description: 可口可乐公司已同意将其印度装瓶部门 40% 的股份出售给 Jubilant Bhartia 集团，具体金额尚未披露。【原文：The Coca-Cola Co. has agreed to sell a 40% stake in its India bottling unit to the Jubilant Bhartia Group for an undisclosed amount as the beverage giant becomes the latest foreign firm to divest a part of its shareholding in its local arm.】

item.title: 欧佩克对 2024 年世界石油需求预测做出迄今最大幅度下调
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）连续第五个月下调今明两年的石油需求增长预期，这是在同意延长供应限制后迄今为止对2024年石油需求增长预期下调幅度最大的一次。【原文：OPEC cut oil demand growth forecasts for this year and next for a fifth straight month, making its deepest reduction to the 2024 outlook so far after agreeing to extend its supply curbs.】

item.title: 美国 11 月 CPI 报告分析
item.description: 纽约 Target 商店玩具区的购物者。摄影师：David Dee Delgado/Bloomberg【原文：Shoppers in the toy section of a Target store in New York. Photographer: David Dee Delgado/Bloomberg】

item.title: 律师称前特拉维古拉首席运营官可能有过失，但不构成犯罪
item.description: Trafigura集团前首席运营官Mike Wainwright的律师告诉瑞士一家法院，他可能有疏忽，但并不知道他授权支付的款项是据称为获得利润丰厚的安哥拉石油和航运合同而支付的贿赂。【原文：Mike Wainwright, the former chief operating officer of Trafigura Group, may have been negligent but didn’t know the payments he was authorizing were bribes allegedly paid to secure lucrative Angolan oil and shipping contracts, his lawyer told a Swiss court.】

item.title: 南非 V&A 公司计划耗资 11 亿美元开发格兰杰湾
item.description: 开普敦的 V&A Waterfront 公司计划以 200 亿兰特（11 亿美元）的价格扩建毗邻的格兰杰湾区，并已向南非第二大城市当局申请开发许可。【原文：Cape Town’s V&A Waterfront plans a 20 billion-rand ($1.1 billion) expansion of the adjacent Granger Bay precinct and has sought permission from authorities in South Africa’s second-biggest city for the development.】

item.title: 沃达丰交易或预示着大合并阻力将减小
item.description: 沃达丰在英国的大型并购交易获得批准，对全球监管机构审查电信交易的方式产生了影响。但首先...【原文：The approval of Vodafone’s big merger deal in the UK has implications for the way global regulators are looking at telecom deals. But first...】

item.title: 中国展示新工具为美国贸易战做好准备
item.description: 如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对世界第二大经济体征收更多关税，中国正在展示其准备使用的新贸易限制工具。【原文：China is showcasing new trade-restricting tools it’s prepared to use should Donald Trump carry out his threat to slap more tariffs on the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 中国转向巴西，特朗普贸易战将对美国农民造成更大伤害
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的第一场贸易战给美国豆农造成了 110 亿美元的损失。续集的情况将更糟。【原文：Donald Trump’s first trade war hurt American soybean farmers to the tune of $11 billion. A sequel is set to be even worse.】

item.title: 亚马逊瞄准 TikTok、YouTube 和 Instagram 上的影响者评论
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）要求在线购物者提供他们在 TikTok、YouTube 和 Instagram 上发布的产品评价信息，这表明这家电子商务巨头正更积极地瞄准商家可以用来获得竞争优势的付费评论。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is asking online shoppers to provide information about product testimonials they’ve posted on TikTok, YouTube and Instagram, suggesting the e-commerce giant is more aggressively targeting paid reviews that merchants can use to gain a competitive edge.】

item.title: 英伟达™（Nvidia）、AMD 和英特尔™（Intel）投资为芯片带来光的初创公司
item.description: Ayar Labs Inc.公司专门利用光在芯片间传输数据，该公司获得了美国三大半导体设计公司的投资，因为该行业正在追求更高效的人工智能处理技术。【原文：Ayar Labs Inc., which specializes in using light to transfer data between chips, scored investment from the three biggest US semiconductor designers as the industry pursues more efficient AI processing.】

item.title: 大赦组织称刚果军队在镇压抗议活动中犯下罪行
item.description: 大赦国际称，刚果民主共和国军队高级军官下令镇压示威者，去年在戈马贸易中心造成数十人死亡，可能犯下了反人类罪。【原文：Senior officers in Democratic Republic of Congo’s army may have committed crimes against humanity by ordering a crackdown on demonstrators that killed dozens of people last year in the trading hub of Goma, Amnesty International said.】

item.title: 波兰将保护私营电视台免遭恶意收购
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）表示，波兰将出台相关法规，防止华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Poland will introduce regulation to prevent potential takeovers of two private TV stations — Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.’s TVN SA and Telewizja Polsat SA — by unwanted suitors, Prime Minister Donald Tusk said.】

item.title: 沃尔玛衰退信号对股票的启示
item.description: 华尔街的繁荣景象无处不在（看看 SpaceX 公司 3500 亿美元的估值），看看逆向指标及其对市场的启示很有意思。【原文：With exuberance everywhere on Wall Street (check out the $350 billion valuation for SpaceX), it’s interesting to look at contrarian indicators and what they say about the market.】

item.title: 肯尼亚先令走强掩盖经济潜在风险
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国大选以来，肯尼亚货币经受住了美元汇率飙升的考验，但除非这个东非国家的经济增长复苏，否则肯尼亚货币将面临崩溃的风险。【原文：Kenya’s currency, which has weathered the surge in the dollar since Donald Trump won the US election, risks foundering unless the East African nation’s economic growth revives.】

item.title: 斯堪的纳维亚汽车销售掀起电动汽车热潮，瑞典却落在后面
item.description: 在旨在让更多零排放汽车上路的慷慨税收政策和激励措施的推动下，挪威和丹麦 11 月份的电动汽车销量超过了化石燃料汽车。【原文：Electric car sales in Norway and Denmark outpaced fossil fuel models in November, driven by generous tax policies and incentives aimed at putting more zero-emission vehicles on the roads.】

item.title: 销售下滑，现代汽车将向中国业务投入 11 亿美元
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co.）和北汽集团（BAIC Motor Corp.）计划向其在华合资企业注资 11 亿美元，以加快该公司向电动汽车的转型，并在全球最大汽车市场销量下滑的情况下促进出口。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. and BAIC Motor Corp. plan to inject $1.1 billion into their China joint venture in a bid to speed up the unit’s transition toward electric vehicles and boost exports amid falling sales in the world’s largest automobile market.】
